attributes.action: Over-rule the prison sentence handed out to medical cannabis grower Roderick Cotton.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In November 07 Roderick Cotton was sentenced to 1 year in prison at Warwick Crown Court, for growing cannabis on behalf of people who used it to relieve the symptoms of various medical conditions.

As cannabis is recognized and prescribed around the world for its beneficial properties, and as there was no question of Mr Cotton supplying cannabis "for personal gain", I hereby petition the Prime Minister to rescind the jail sentence and free Roderick Cotton.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
